mapper.select: select to_char(a.APPLY_DT,'yyyy/MM/dd') as CPL_DT, a.APPLY_DT, a.OFFER_AMT, a.OFFER_TYPE_DESC, a.ORDER_ITEM_ACCEPT_DATE, a.AGENT_POINT_ID, a.AGENT_POINT_NAME, a.MSU_YHK_BY_CNT, a.MSU_XYFQ_CNT, a.MSU_BXL_CNT, a.MSU_ZNZW_CNT, a.MSU_YHK_CNT, a.MSU_PROM_5G_CNT, a.MSU_SJ_PROM_5G_CNT, a.MSU_FK_PROM_5G_CNT, a.MKT_FJ_NAME, a.MKT_ZJ_NAME, a.ACC_NUM, a.MKT_EMPLOYEE_NAME, a.SALES_EMPLOYEE_NAME from nbetl.RPT_REAL_prom_LST_IO_DAY_D_sbj@"XFK.REGRESS.RDBMS.DEV.US.ORACLE.COM" a where a.APPLY_DT between #{start} and #{end} and a.IO_FLG='I' and a.std_area_lvl5_name like'%鄞州%'
